name: Momentum (itch) (rubr)
description:
Have you ever imagined riding a hoverboard? No? Then you're lame.

Experience what you've been missing out on (hoverboard riding) in Momentum!  Navigate trough narrow path ways filled with enemies and then smack said enemies!

Features include (but are not limited to):

  • hoverboards;
  • enemies who do not like hoverboards;
  • smacking  enemies who do not like hoverboards;
  • there's a cool timer thingy;
  • the blissful sound of silence.

Controls:

  • UP ARROW or W to jump;
  • DOWN ARROW or S while on ground to slide;
  • DOWN ARROW or S while mid-air to dive;
  • You automatically slide when you land after a dive;
  • Performing any of those actions costs you one bar of dash resource, which slowly regenerates. You also get one bar when you smack an enemy;
  • You can kill enemies by sliding or diving. Doing so reduces your time a little.

Made in 72 hours for Minijam 15.
